message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. After careful consideration, we are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $2000000. This unique opportunity allows you to secure a high-quality item at an exclusive rate, reflecting its unparalleled value and craftsmanship. We believe this price not only represents the true worth of our product but also provides you with significant savings compared to market rates. We look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you and your endeavors.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget. I'm excited about the product, but I need to make a smart financial decision.
